264:474: caratā ca purā jagadarthe madri pativrata tyakta saputrā |
264:477: uttaptavīryu yada āsīt arthadhanaśriyo'pi ca purā me || 122 ||
264:479: pūjā kṛtā daśabalānām āsi nṛpātmaji vimalatejāḥ || 123 ||
264:480: raudrākṣa eva ca ruṣitvā yācitavān sa cāpi mama śīrṣam |
264:481: dattaṃ nikṛtya ca mayā tad rāja yadā ca candraprabha āsīt || 124 ||
264:483: sattvārtha sthāpit mayā te puṇyasamo babhūva ca yadāham || 125 ||
264:485: tyaktāṃ pūrvabhaveṣu caratā me āsi yadā śubho nṛpati pūrve || 126 ||
264:487: tyaktaśca me makuṭa pūrva āsi nṛpo yadā ratanacūḍaḥ || 127 ||
264:489: tyaktau karau sacaraṇau me pūrva nṛpeṇa dhṛtimatā ca || 128 ||
264:491: kṛta mānuṣā badaradvīpe siṃhala sārthavāha yada āsīt || 129 ||
264:492: kāmeṣu mṛrcchitamanā me bāli sa rākṣasī pramadasaṃjñā |
264:493: pañcaśatāni vaṇijānāṃ mokṣita te yadā bhave sunetraḥ || 130 ||
264:495: pravrajya nirgatu jinasya śāsane puṇyaraśmi yada āsīt || 131 ||
264:496: mayi tyaktamaṅguli udārā sattvahitārthameva caratā me |
264:497: jālārcitā vimalaśuddhā kāñcanavarṇa pārthiva yada āsīt || 132 ||
264:499: tyaktā mayā ca jagadarthe utpalanetre pārthiva yadāsīt || 133 ||
264:501: parimocitā karuṇayā me keśava vaidyarāja yada āsīt || 134 ||
264:502: vyādhyāturaṃ ca naramīkṣya svaṃ rudhiraṃ pradattamapi me'bhūt |
264:503: nirvyādhitaḥ sa ca kṛto me prāgbhava sarvadarśi yadabhūvam || 135 ||
264:504: hivā svamasthi ca śarīrād vyādhikṛśasya majja mayā dattam |
264:505: na ca sattva tyakta maya jātu āsi nṛpo yadā kusuma nāma || 136 ||
264:506: sarvasvakośamapi tyaktva jīvita tyakta me priya manāpam |
264:507: naru mokṣito vyasanaprāpta āsi nṛpo'rthasiddhi yada pūrvam || 137 ||
264:509: nṛpa āśuketu yada āsīd bodhimabhīpsamāna jagadarthe || 138 ||
264:510: nṛpa sarvadarśi yada āsīt kāruṇiko janārthahitakāmaḥ |
264:511: tyaktā mayā caturo'pi ca dvīpāḥ sphītanarairvranarīśataiśca || 139 ||
264:512: mṛdu komalaṃ vikalagauraṃ ūru tacchittva hṝṣṭamuditāyā |
264:513: dattaṃ svamāṃsa rudhiraṃ me jñānavatī yadāsi nṛpaputrī || 140 ||
264:515: strī prekṣya me kṣudhatṛṣārtaṃ sā rūpya (pa ?)
264:519: rājñaḥ suto tu vikṛtajñaḥ tārita sāgarādyada kṛtajñaḥ |
264:520: ratnārtha netra mama tena uddhṛta naiva me ruṣita cittam || 143 ||
264:521: mā bhūtpipīlikavadho me tyakta varāśrayo'pi canapekṣya |
264:522: na ca citta kampita tadā me tyakta pūrvabhaveṣu godha yada āsīt || 144 ||
264:524: na ca mānavānapi ca stabdha āsi kapiṃjalo vicaramāṇaḥ || 145 ||
264:525: śaraṇāgatasya ca mayārthe tyakta samucchrayaḥ kṛpa janitvā |
264:526: na ca tyakta vānaragatena vyādhanaraḥ śarābhinihatena || 146 ||
264:527: gajavaśagatena śoṣito me tanurapi vṛddhaguruṃ jagatsmaritvā |
264:528: suruciramaśanaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ mokṣita ātma gajā yadā tadāsīt || 147 ||
264:529: ṛkṣapatirabhūva śailadurge himahata sapta dināni rakṣito me |
264:530: puruṣa vadhaku tena me prayukto na ca pratighāta kṛtaśca me tadāsmin || 148 ||
264:532: sa viṣeṇa śareṇa ca viddho daṃṣṭravarāṃstyajamāna na dviṣṭaḥ || 149 ||
264:535: gaṅgataraṅgajalairhiyamāṇaḥ tārita me yada āsi mṛgatve |
264:536: vadhakā mama tenapanītā naiva mano mama tatra praduṣṭam || 151 ||
264:538: taiśca hataḥ kṣudhitaiśca tadāhaṃ kacchapayonigato'pi ca maitraḥ || 152 ||
264:539: bodhicariṃ caramāṇahu pūrvaṃ matsya babhūva yadā jalacarī |
264:542: sattva kṛtāḥ sukhitā nirujāśca prāṇaku saumya tadā ca yadāsīt || 154 ||
264:543: siṃha babhūva yadā mṛgarājā sthāmabalānvita kāruṇikaśca |
264:544: viddha śareṇa na dūṣita cittaṃ maitri tadā vadhake'pi tadā me || 155 ||
264:545: śaṅkhatuṣāranibho hayarājā āsi purā ca samudrataṭe'ham |
264:546: rākṣasimadhyagatā vaṇijo me tārita kṛtva kṛpāṃ karuṇāṃ ca || 156 ||
264:547: bodhicariṃ caramāṇa janārthe āsi kuṇāla ahaṃ yada pakṣī |
264:548: varjita kāmaguṇā bahudoṣā no ca vaśaṃ pramadāna gato'ham || 157 ||
264:549: āsi śaśo vanagulmanivāsī śāsatī taṃ sukṛte śaśavargam |
264:551: āsi śuko drumapuṣpaphalāḍhyo śuṣkadrumo na ca me sa hi tyaktaḥ |
264:552: dṛṣṭa kṛtajña tadā mama śakrastaṃ kṛtavāṃstaru patraphalāḍhyam || 159 ||
264:554: rājabhayāttu vimokṣita te me vānararāja ahaṃ yada āsīt || 160 ||
264:555: śuka bhūta purā guruhetoḥ śāli haraṃśca nareṇa gṛhītaḥ |
264:556: kiṃ nu śukā harase mama śāli nāśayate'pi ca pakṣi maśasyam ( matsasyam) || 161 ||
264:557: śuka so'bravīdbhadra śṛṇuṣva caurya harāmi na te ahu śālim |
264:558: jīrṇagurudvayapoṣaṇahetoḥ śāli harāmi kṛpārtha tu teṣām || 162 ||
264:559: bīja prakīrṇa yadā prathamaṃ te bhāga dadāmi sarvajanasya |
264:560: tacca giraṃ vadato mama śrutvā tenāpi caurya bhavenna kadācit || 163 ||
264:561: sādhu śukā hara śāli yatheṣṭaṃ durlabha mānuṣa yasyimu bhaktiḥ |
264:562: mānuṣa tvaṃ maya tīryagatehā sādhu damaḥ śama saṃyama tubhyam || 164 ||
264:563: ityevamāni caritāni pūrva caranta duṣkara kṛtāni |
264:564: na ca me manasi tatra bhavi kheda eṣata uttamāṃ viraja bodhim || 165 ||
264:565: ādhyātmikaṃ hyatha ca bāhyaṃ nāsti hi vastu yanmayā na dattam |
264:566: śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya dhyāna upāya prajña carito'ham || 166 ||
264:567: māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ tathapi ca majja śoṇitameva datta svaśarīrāt |
264:568: prānte guhāsu ca yadā me śoṣita āśrayo'pi caratā me || 167 ||
264:569: dhutayāna deśita jinebhiḥ yatra prayujyato jina bhavanti |
264:570: tatra dhute satataṃ ca prayukto āsi caranta pure ahu nityam || 168 ||
264:571: etādṛśā vrata udārā ye ca niṣevitā caratā me |
264:572: śrutvā ca teṣamimāścaryamekapade na bhaviṣyati chandaḥ || 169 ||
264:573: hāsyu bhaviṣyati ima śruṇitvā śāsanametadeva ca taḍānīm |
264:576: śrutvā ca dharmamima śāntaṃ naiṣa jinokta ityabhivadanti || 171 ||
264:577: ācāryo me śrutasamudro āsi bahuśrutaḥ kathikaśreṣṭhaḥ |
264:578: tenāpi caiṣa pratiṣiddho buddhavaco hi naiṣa tu kathaṃcit || 172 ||
264:579: parato'pyabhūdapi ca vṛddhaḥ tasya guruḥ sa śāmitaguṇaughaḥ |
264:580: tenāpi naiṣa hi gṛhīto mātra prayujyatha vitathametat || 173 ||
264:581: yatrātma nāsti na ca jīvo deśita pudgalo'pi na kathaṃcit |
264:582: vyarthaḥ śramo'tra ghaṭate yaḥ śīlaprayoga saṃvarakriyā ca || 174 ||
264:583: yadyasti caiva mahāyānaṃ nātra hi ātma sattva manujo vā |
264:584: vyarthaḥ śramo'tra hi kṛto me yatra na cātmasattvaupalabdhiḥ || 175 ||
264:586: bhāṣeta no jina kadācit vācamimāṃ hi bhikṣuparibhāṣām || 176 ||
264:588: bhavitā hi bhikṣava mameha śāsani īrṣyamānamadadagdhāḥ || 177 ||
264:591: buddhasya te dhvaja gṛhītvā sevakarā gṛhasthajanatāyām |
264:592: lekhaṃ vahanti satataṃ te śāsanadaṃ vihāya guṇarāśim | 179 ||
264:595: naiṣāmanāryamapi vācyaṃ naiva ca kiṃcidasti yadakāryam |
264:596: staupika sāṃghikaṃ hyapi ca vittaṃ paugdalikaṃ ca yacca samameṣām || 181 ||
264:597: bhikṣuṇa vīkṣya ca guṇāḍhyaṃ teṣvapi cāpyavarṇa kathayanti |
264:598: duḥśīla vañcaka praviśya kuhāste strī ca vināśayanti hi sughorāḥ || 182 ||
264:599: gṛddho gṛhīṇa tathā kāmairyādṛśe pravrajitva te gṛddhāḥ |
264:600: bhāryāṃ sutā duhitaraśca teṣu bhaviṣya gṛhisamānam ||| 183 ||
264:603: kāmā ime khalu na sevyāḥ pātana tiryakpretanirayeṣu |
264:604: vakṣyanti te sada gṛhīṇāṃ te ca svayamadānta anupaśāntāḥ || 185 ||
264:605: svayameva te yatha adāntāḥ śiṣyagaṇo'pi teṣa na sudāntaḥ |
264:607: sevārthameva na guṇārthaṃ te khalu saṃgrahaṃ dadati teṣām |
264:608: śiṣyagaṇaiḥ svakaiḥ parivṛto'haṃ pūja jane sadātra cala sidhya || 187 ||
264:609: kathayanti te'pi ca janasya saṃgraha eṣa me karuṇayaiṣām |
264:610: upasthāma prārthayāmi tebhya śiṣyagaṇebhya eva na kadācit || 188 ||
264:612: pravrajiṣyanti narakeṣu āgatā āgatā sada anāryāḥ || 189 ||
264:614: gṛhiṇo na te'pi vna ca bhikṣū varjita te yathā śmaśāna iva dāruḥ || 190 ||
264:615: śikṣāsu cādara na teṣāṃ syānna ca prātimokṣavinaye vā |
264:617: vanavāsināmapi hi teṣāṃ grāmagataṃ bhaviṣyati hi cittam |
264:618: kleśāgninā prapatitānāṃ cittamavasthitaṃ hi na ca teṣām || 192 ||
264:619: vismṛtya buddhaguṇa sarvān śikṣadhutāṃśca te'pi ca upāyāna |
264:623: dhyānaṃ tathādhyayanaṃ tyaktvā nitya vihārakarmaṇi niyuktāḥ |
264:625: na ca karmiko hyahaṃ vihāre ātmana hetureṣa hi kṛto me |
264:628: damasaṃyame satatayuktāḥ saṃgraha teṣu te na kurute ca || 197 ||
264:630: saṃmodikasya ca mamedaṃ gaccha na te'sti vāsa iha kaścit || 198 ||
264:631: śayyāsanaṃ nikhila dattaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpitā iha prabhūtāḥ |
264:632: na ca lābhasaṃbhava ihāsti kiṃ paribhokṣyase'tra vraja bhikṣo || 199 ||
264:633: śayyāsanoddiśana teṣāṃ naiva bhaviṣyate'pi ca kadācit |
264:635: nirbhartsitā pi ca samantātte hi mamaurasāścarimakāle |
264:636: vacanaṃ na caite mam hi smṛtvā prāntavane tadābhinivasanti || 201 ||
264:637: hā śāsanaṃ jinavarasya nāśamupekṣya hi nacireṇa |
264:638: lābhābhibhūta guṇadviṣṭā bhikṣavaḥ prādurbhūta bahu yatra || 202 ||
264:641: sada satkṛtā guṇavihīnā bhedaka sūcakāḥ kalahakāmāḥ |
264:642: te śāstṛsaṃmata janasya te ca bhaviṣyanti mānamadadagdhāḥ || 204 ||
264:645: ratnākaro yatha viluptaḥ sthāsyati padminīva pariśuṣkā |
264:646: yūpa vararatnamayaṃ bhagnaṃ naśyati śāsanaṃ carimakāle || 206 ||
264:648: te cāpi bhikṣava adāntā nāśayitāraḥ śāsanaṃ mamedam || 207 ||
264:649: ma caryasevaniratānāṃ dūrata saṃgatiḥ kvacana teṣām |
264:650: pretagatirnrake'pi ca vāsaḥ tiryagatiśca ito hi cyutānām || 208 ||
264:652: labdhvā sa mānuṣabhavaṃ vā jāyati duḥkhitaḥ satata śocyaḥ || 209 ||
264:653: andho'tha vā badhira kāṇo jāyati citragātra suvirūpā |
264:655: viśrambhate'sya na ca kaścit śraddadhate'sya cāpi na ca vākyam |
264:658: kṣuttṛṣṇa yena paritaptāste ca bhavanti sadā suparibhūtāḥ || 212 ||
264:659: duḥkhā ananta iti jñātvā dūra pāpacaryaṃ vijahitvā |
264:660: sevetha sādhucari nityaṃ mā bhavitānutāpa iha paścāt || 213 ||
264:661: yasya priyo bhavati buddho āryagaṇaśca śikṣa dhutadharmāḥ |
264:666: udyujyatāṃ ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu |
264:667: mā jātu saṃśayata vīryaṃ yāvanna budhyathā pravarabodhim ||216 ||
